contentrichtext.text: The abbreviation '''EVP''' may refer to: * [[vice president#Levels in business administration|Executive Vice President]], an officer in government or business who is next in rank below a president. * The [[Estonian Left Party]] (Eesti Vasakpartei), a political party * The [[Evangelical People's Party of Switzerland]], a political party * The [[Evangelical People's Party (Netherlands)|Evangelical People's Party]], a former minor political party in the Netherlands * ''in Europe:'' {{de icon}} “Europäische Volkspartei”, see [[European People's Party]] or [[European People's Party (European Parliament group)]] * [[Employee value proposition]], rewards and benefits potential for an employee * [[Enhanced Virus Protection]], a feature found in modern AMD processors * Electric membrane vacuum pump, a type of [[vacuum pump]] sometimes used in thin film deposition * [[Electronic voice phenomena]], anomalous voices or other sounds on electronic audio recordings * Elementary vacuum particle, a concept found in theories of [[cold fusion]] * Embedded Vector Processor, an integrated circuit from the family of [[vector processor|vector processors]] used in the mobile phone industry and elsewhere {{disambig}}
